main_definition: Bracelets are circular or semi-circular bands worn around the wrist, often as jewelry.

meanings_and_examples.example: She wore a gold bracelet on her wrist.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Symbolic gifts exchanged between friends or family members
meanings_and_examples.example: They gave each other friendship bracelets as a sign of their bond.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A unit in baseball that involves two players from the batting team attempting to hit the ball thrown by the pitcher.
meanings_and_examples.example: The batter stepped up and prepared for his third strike, hoping not to be called out with a bracelet.
